Wild Elekid, Electabuzz and Electivire }} ===Description=== The Electirizer is a type of [[Evolution Items|Evolution Item]] that can be first encountered in the [[Kanto]] Region, but that is first usable in the [[Sinnoh]] Region. ===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
